info.title: Kentico Cloud
info.description:
This is a collection of resources you can find within the [Kentico Cloud Developer Hub](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/). [Kentico Cloud](https://kenticocloud.com/) is a cloud-first headless CMS that allows you to distribute content to any channel and device (websites, mobile devices, mixed reality devices, presentation kiosks etc.) through an API.

Certain APIs require that you include the `authorization` header. Find more in <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/reference#authentication>.

get.description: Filter the content items by content type by including the `order` query parameter and a content element codename.

get.summary: View a content item by ID
get.description: Retrieve metadata information about a content item specified by its internal ID.

put.summary: Update a content item by ID
put.description: Update an existing content item specified by its internal ID.

delete.summary: Delete a content item by ID
delete.description: Delete a content item specified by its internal ID. Note that deleting a content item deletes all of its language variants as well.

get.summary: Filtering based on date with Delivery API
get.description:
Filter content items directly in the API call using the `element.element_codename` query parameter and *publish from* and *publish until* elements.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/scheduling-content-unpublishing#section-filtering-by-date-with-the-delivery-api> for more details.

get.summary: View a content item by codename
get.description: Retrieve metadata information about a content item specified by its codename.

put.summary: Update a content item by codename
put.description: Update an existing content item specified by its codename.

delete.summary: Delete a content item by codename
delete.description:
Delete a content item specified by its codename.

Note that deleting a content item deletes all of its language variants as well.

get.summary: View a language variant by language codename
get.description: Retrieve content of a variant of a content item. The content item is specified by its internal ID and the project language is specified by its codename.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language codename
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. The content item is specified by its internal ID and the project language is specified by its codename.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

delete.summary: Delete a variant by language codename
delete.description:
Delete a specific language variant. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its codename.

Note that when you delete the last variant of a content item, the whole content item is deleted.

put.description:
Add content in a specific language to your new content item by performing an upsert.

* In the request URL, you need to specify the content item you are importing to (for example, `/items/external-id/ext-cafe-brno-59713`) and the language of the variant (for example, `/variants/codename/en-US`).
* The request body must contain the `elements` object in which you specify only the content elements you want to update. Omitted elements will remain unchanged.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.

get.description: Retrieve the names of segments that the specified visitor belongs to.

put.description:
One of the ways to import content to your project is to send a PUT request to the `<cmApiUrl>/items/external-id/<your item ID>` endpoint.

In the body of the request, specify these properties:

* `name` – string with a display name of the new content item.
* `type` – reference to a content type.
* (Optional) `sitemap_locations` – array of references to sitemap locations.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/importing-to-kentico-cloud#section-1-creating-a-content-item> for

get.summary: View a language variant by language ID
get.description: Retrieve content of a language variant of a content item. Both the content item and the project language are specified by their internal IDs.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language ID
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. Both the content item and project language are specified by their internal IDs.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

delete.summary: Delete a variant by language ID
delete.description:
Delete a specific language variant. Both the content item and the project language are specified by their internal IDs.

Note that when you delete the last variant of a content item, the whole content item is deleted.

get.summary: View an asset by external ID
get.description: Retrieve information about a single asset specified by its external ID.

put.summary: Upsert an asset by external ID
put.description:
Add a new asset or update an existing asset specified by its external ID.

**Note:** If no asset with the specified external ID exists in the project, the system will try to create one. For existing assets, the API updates only the specified asset's descriptions and title.

delete.description: Removes an unused asset specified by its external ID.

get.description: Retrieve a dynamically paginated list of assets.

post.description:
Use a file reference to link an existing [binary file](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-upload-file) to a new asset. You can also create assets by upserting (`PUT /assets/external-id/<external_id>`), see [Upsert an asset](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-upsert-asset-by-external-id).

**Note:** Each binary file can be referenced only by a single asset.

get.description:
Retrieve one personalization variant you want to display. To learn more about retrieving content, consult the [Delivery API reference](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/reference#delivery-api).

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/personalizing-content#section-displaying-the-right-content> for more examples.

Modifies properties of an asset specified by its internal ID.

Note: This endpoint only allows updating of asset descriptions and title.

put.description: Retrieve a dynamically paginated list of assets.

delete.description: Removes an unused asset specified by its internal ID.

get.summary: View a language variant by language ID
get.description: Retrieve content of a variant of a content item. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its internal ID.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language ID
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its internal ID.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

delete.summary: Delete a variant by language ID
delete.description:
Delete a specific language variant. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its internal ID.

Note that when you delete the last variant of a content item, the whole content item is deleted.

get.summary: View a language variant by language codename
get.description: Retrieve content of a variant of a content item. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its codename.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language codename
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. The content item is specified by its external ID and the project language is specified by its codename.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

post.description: Submit the visitor's email address and other information.
Log a custom action for a specified visitor.
Log a new session for a specified visitor.

get.description:
Get a content item in a specific language variant by using the `language` parameter.

See [Getting localized content items](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/localization#section-getting-localized-content-items) for more details.

get.summary: View a content Item by external ID
get.description: Retrieve metadata information about a content item specified by its external ID.

put.summary: Update a content item by external ID
put.description:
Add a new content item or update an existing content item specified by its external ID.

**Note:** If no content item with the specified external ID exists in the project, the system will try to create one. For existing content items, the API updates the content item's name and sitemap locations.
You can also specify the external ID when [adding content items](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-add-item) via the POST method.

get.description: Retrieve a list of language variants of a content item specified by its codename.

Retrieve a specific taxonomy group from your project by specifying its codename.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#view-a-taxonomy-group> for more details.

get.summary: View data of visitor by ID

delete.summary: Delete data of visitor by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of language variants of a content item specified by its internal ID.

Retrieve a specific content type from your project by specifying its codename.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#view-a-content-type> for more details.
Retrieve visitors that match the specified segment.
Retrieve a dynamically paginated list of content items.

post.description:
Create a new content item based on a specific content type. Content items do NOT contain any content themselves, but serve as wrappers for individual language variants.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-add-item> for details about adding content to a specific language variant.

If you are importing content from a different system and want to use the same identifiers for your content as in the previous system, you can use the `external_id` body attribute

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of taxonomy groups in your project.

By default, the API returns all taxonomy groups ordered alphabetically by codename, but [pagination can be customized](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#listing-response).

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#list-taxonomy-groups> for more details.

Use the Personalization API to retrieve the list of segments that the specified visitor belongs to.

* Authenticate the request using your Personalization API Key.
* Specify the User ID of the visitor you are asking about.
 
See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/personalizing-content#section-retrieving-visitor-s-segments> for more details.

get.summary: View a language variant by language ID
get.description: Retrieve content of a variant of a content item. The content item is specified by codename and the project language is specified its internal ID.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language ID
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. The content item is specified by its codename and the project language is specified by its internal ID.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

delete.summary: Delete a variant by language ID
delete.description:
Delete a specific language variant. The content item is specified by codename and the project language is specified its internal ID.

Note that when you delete the last variant of a content item, the whole content item is deleted.

get.description:
Retrieve a list of content types in your project.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#list-content-types> for more details.

get.summary: View a language variant by language codename
get.description: Retrieve content of a language variant of a content item. Both the content item and the language are specified by their codenames.

put.summary: Upsert a variant by language codename
put.description:
Add content to a variant in an active project language, or update an existing language variant. Both the content item and project language are specified by their codenames.

**Note:** Only the elements specified in the request body will be modified. Any existing comments attached to these elements will be lost on update.

get.summary: Getting items by localized URL slug
get.description:
Get a *Home* content item whose URL slug in Spanish is *inicio* by using the following parameters:

* `language=es-ES` – specifies the codename of the requested language.
* `system.type=home` – filters content items by their content type.
* `elements.url_pattern=inicio` – filters content items by a value of a specific content element.

See [Getting items by localized URL slug](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/localization#section-getting-items-by-localized-url-slug) for more details

post.description:
Check your project's content items for issues, such as:

* Content elements are [referencing](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-reference-object) non-existing objects.
* Values of certain content elements do not meet the limitations set in content types.

Use the endpoint after successfully importing content to your project.

get.description: Retrieve a list of language variants of a content item specified by its external ID.

get.summary: View data of visitor by email

delete.summary: Delete data of visitor by email

post.description:
Add a new file. The uploaded file will not be visible in the Kentico Cloud UI unless there is an asset using it, see how to [add an asset](https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#content-management-api-add-asset).

**Note:** Maximum size limit for binary files is 100 MB.

get.description:
Preview a specific content item.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/docs/preview-content-via-api> for details.

Retrieve a specific content type element by specifying its codename and its parent content type.

See <https://developer.kenticocloud.com/v1/reference#view-a-content-type-element> for more details.
